lines.text: Have you considered the possibility that the machine may be haunted?
Oh yeah, Mark, that's the first thing that popped into my mind!
Mr. Gartley, do something!
Do somethin'?
[to Lin Sue]
She wants me to do something!
[to Sherry]
I'll do somethin'! I'll do a little DANCE! That's what I'll do! I'll do a little jig for ya, Sherry!
[after seeing Mrs. Frawley get crushed by the mangler]
Ah, Frawley, you stupid old bitch. Always getting in the way. Goddamn it, goddamn it, goddamn it!
It folded her like a sheet Mark!
[first lines]
What are you doing? Not up here. Get back down there. Jesus. Morons.
[last lines]
Never enough time around here. I'm not running a charity here, Herb. Tell them to get their lazy asses in gear.
Sherry. You heard the boss! Keep movin'!
Whats in this?
I don't know, they're antacids, I got them from Mrs. Frawley.

[looking at ingredients on antacid bottle]
Belladonna? You got these from Mrs. Frawley?
The Hand of Glory?
I think... we may be fucked.
